title: 4 Project Hextech Chest?
body: So I thought there was four project chest red,blue,yellow,green but only the green,blue,red came out?

replies.body: What's problem with that PROJECT disruption cache, is there any bug? And it said any of the old project skin shard and blueprint, is that mean if I already zed blueprint I still possible to get the same skin shard with blueprint?

The fourth cache has not yet been released.  Per the [project disruption guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4) we've crafted to help, the disruption cache is slated to make an appearance at a later time.  Hope that helps!
Is the later time going to be before August 16th or after August 16th?
